I’m a full professor in Computer Science at the <a href="http://limos.fr" target="_blank"> LIMOS</a> lab of Clermont-Auvergne University and CNRS.

I’m Vice dean of <a href="https://www.clermont-auvergne-inp.fr" target="_blank">  Clermont-Auvergne-INP </a>(education and training) and Assistant director of LIMOS.

My research interests are centered on data analysis, viewed from both a methodological and an applicative point of view. This include image and video processing, mesh processing, computational geometry, machine and deep learning.

I mainly teach at <a href="http://www.isima.fr" target="_blank"> ISIMA</a>, an engineering school in computer science of Clermont-Auvergne INP.
